resources.string: We are developing long term support for the current version of the app. This includes frequent updates till April 2017. If you find any bugs, issues or problems, send an email to \'contact@secretbiology.com\'. Your feedback and criticism is also welcome:)
We have detected two different trip lists for this route. Which one do you want to edit? You can always change, edit, delete unwanted changes or reset to default later on.
There are a total of %d trip list(s) detected for this route. Do you want to change existing trips or add more?

You are about to delete \' %1$s - %2$s %3$s\' route from your database. You will not be able to check trips for this route further. However, you can always add new routes or reset to default routes from settings.
What is the origin and destination of your route?
Trip list is empty.\nYou can click on \"+\" button to add trips
You can add as many as trips you want.
Click on trip to see more options
Click on title to avail more options
You can add trip(s) for any day of week.
Select first trip of the day
We all like to skip steps, but you have to complete the previous step before using this one :)
There is only one route left in your database. You must always keep at least one route in your database for proper functioning of this app.
Congratulations! You have successfully added %s route into database. You can always reset all trips to default from the settings.
You have successfully deleted route from the database. You can always reset all trips to default from the settings.
Login to access account related settings
You have not received any notifications yet.
This field can not be empty.
Provide a valid email address - we won\'t spam :)
Provide a valid email address to send the \'reset password\' link.
Password should be at least 6 character long
Network not found. Please check your internet connection.
We have sent further instructions to \'%s\'. Please check your inbox for further details.
Link to reset password will be sent to your email address \'%s\'. Please check your inbox for further details.
Your password has been successfully updated!
New password and confirm password should be the same.
Old Password for your account \'%s\' is not correct. Please enter the correct password.
N/A, please log in to sync data
You will not be able to sync data to your account or get latest updated transport timings (if any)

Important ! You are about to reset all of your transport routes to their default values. These values were last created on 30 December 2016. They might be incorrect. Hence, please check with the NCBS reception for further validation.
Introducing all new app design.\nA small step towards self-sustained app creation.
No more Offline or Online modes.\nSingle unified design for better user experience.
Introducing new useful feature. Now you can create your own custom travel routes, shuttles, buggy or anything you like.
We have improved network operations for lowest amount of internet uses. You can sync all your edited routes, preferences to our cloud server.

This will be the last app upgrade. We are shutting down development of this app soon. Hence any developer is welcome to continue this work further. Don\'t worry, this version of app will be supported for any bugs or issues.
